property.name: yarn.admin.acl
property.description: ACL to set admins on the cluster. ACLs are of for comma-separated-usersspace comma-separated-groups. Defaults to special value of * which means anyone. Special value of just space means no one has access.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation-enable
property.description: Configuration to enable or disable log aggregation是否启用日志聚集功能

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.ha.automatic-failover.enabled
property.description: 启动自动故障转移,默认为false

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.cluster-id
property.description: 集群名称，确保HA选举时对应的集群

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs
property.description: 中间结果存放位置，类似于1.0中的mapred.local.dir。注意，这个参数通常会配置多个目录，已分摊磁盘IO负载。 Comma-separated list of paths on the local filesystem where intermediate data is written. Multiple paths help spread disk i/o.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.log-dirs
property.description: 日志存放地址（可配置多个目录） Comma-separated list of paths on the local filesystem where logs are written. Multiple paths help spread disk i/o.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.log.retain-seconds
property.description: NodeManager上日志最多存放时间（不启用日志聚集功能时有效） Default time (in seconds) to retain log files on the NodeManager. ***Only applicable if log-aggregation is disabled.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir
property.description: 当应用程序运行结束后，日志被转移到的HDFS目录（启用日志聚集功能时有效） HDFS directory where the application logs are moved on application completion. Need to set appropriate permissions. ***Only applicable if log-aggregation is enabled.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir-suffix
property.description: Suffix appended to the remote log dir. Logs will be aggregated to ${yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir}/${user}/${thisParam}. ***Only applicable if log-aggregation is enabled.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.aux-services
property.description: Shuffle service that needs to be set for Map Reduce applications.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation.retain-seconds
property.description: 在HDFS上聚集的日志最多保存多长时间 How long to keep aggregation logs before deleting them. -1 disables. Be careful, set this too small and you will spam the name node.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation.retain-check-interval-seconds
property.description: 多长时间检查一次日志，并将满足条件的删除，如果是0或者负数，则为上一个值的1/10;默认值：-1 Time between checks for aggregated log retention. If set to 0 or a negative value then the value is computed as one-tenth of the aggregated log retention time. Be careful, set this too small and you will spam the name node.
